name: John Rodgers Terminal
text: §261-24  John Rodgers Terminal.  When a new transpacific terminal building is constructed, it shall be designated "John Rodgers Terminal" in memory of the late Commander John Rodgers, United States Navy, who made the first flight in a Navy flying boat to these islands in September, 1925. [L 1947, c 31, §2; RL 1955, §15-28; HRS §261-24]
